snippet: Georges Vandenbeusch, 42, who was reported to have been held in Nigeria by Boko Haram, a group with ties to Al Qaeda, was released on Tuesday, according to French authorities.
abstract: French priest Georges Vandenbeusch is released in Nigeria by Boko Haram; Vandenbeusch was kidnapped in November in northern Cameroon.
lead_paragraph: Georges Vandenbeusch, 42, who was reported to have been held in Nigeria by Boko Haram, a group with ties to Al Qaeda, was released on Tuesday, according to French authorities.

headline.main: Cameroon: Kidnapped French Priest Is Released
headline.print_headline: Cameroon: Kidnapped French Priest Is Released
